definition: an untruth; by implication, a sham (often adverbial)
kjvTranslation: without a cause, deceit(-ful), false(-hood, -ly), feignedly, liar, [phrase] lie, lying, vain (thing), wrongfully.

translations.bg: неистина; по подразбиране - измама (често с наречие)
translations.da: en usandhed; underforstået et falsum (ofte adverbial)
translations.de: eine Unwahrheit; implizit auch eine Täuschung (oft adverbial)
translations.el: μια αναλήθεια- κατ' επέκταση, μια απάτη (συχνά επιρρηματικό)
translations.es: una falsedad; por implicación, una farsa (a menudo adverbial)
translations.fr: une contre-vérité ; par implication, une imposture (souvent adverbiale)
translations.id: sebuah ketidakbenaran; dengan implikasi, sebuah kepalsuan (sering kali kata keterangan)
translations.it: una falsità; per implicazione, un'impostura (spesso avverbiale)
translations.lv: nepatiesība; netieši - izlikšanās (bieži ar apstākļa vārdu)
translations.nb: en usannhet; underforstått, en bløff (ofte adverbial)
translations.nl: een onwaarheid; impliciet een schijnvertoning (vaak bijwoordelijk)
translations.pt: uma mentira; implicitamente, uma farsa (frequentemente adverbial)
translations.ro: un neadevăr; implicit, o farsă (adesea adverbial)
translations.ru: неправда; по косвенным признакам, притворство (часто наречие)
translations.sl: neresnica; implicitno tudi prevara (pogosto v prislovnem določilu)
translations.sv: en osanning; underförstått, en bluff (ofta adverbial)
translations.tr: gerçek olmayan; ima yoluyla, bir sahtekarlık (genellikle zarf)
